posts.post_title: Want to trade for a Hal Chase Blue?
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jason L
I accidentally double-bought a few weeks back (ever go a little high early on an auction and then forget about it?) [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

I have a PSA 3 T206 Hal Chase-Blue portrait available.

Do you have any of these cards?
(ideally, with nice color & registration, and SGC preferred)
T205 Jimmy Archer
T205 Lewis Richie
T206 Demmitt-NY Amer
T206 Donovan Det (throwing)
condition of the backs is less important for the T206s

let me know
thx
Jason
